power_profile_id.description: ID of the PPBC.PowerProfileDefinition of which the data element ‘sequence_container_id’ refers to.

sequence_container_id.description: ID of the PPBC.PowerSequenceContainer this PPBC.PowerSequenceContainerStatus provides information about.

selected_sequence_id.description: ID of selected PPBC.PowerSequence. When no ID is given, no sequence was selected yet.

progress.description: Time that has passed since the selected sequence has started. A value must be provided, unless no sequence has been selected or the selected sequence hasn’t started yet.
